rooms.description: Open-plan living area with integrated kitchen. Features streamlined furniture and geometric patterns in line with Art Deco design.
Two-car garage with automated door system, built to be wheelchair accessible. Incorporates safety features and ample space.
A compact utility area adjacent to the open-plan living/kitchen for appliances and storage.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars, non-slip surfaces. Designed in accordance with Vastu principles ensuring proper alignment.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented to the west, following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Direct access from ground floor garage to open-plan area. Designed with automated doors.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage, designed following Art Deco aesthetics and Vastu principles ensuring proper alignment of the bed.
Wheelchair accessible ensuite bathroom integrated into the master bedroom area with ample space for accessibility features.

openings.description: Balcony providing scenic view and ensuring proper alignment as per Vastu guidelines.
